attributes.title: 0/10 WOULD NOT RECOMMEND 🤮
attributes.review: It was a Wednesday evening when I had the bright idea of downloading Donald trumps app to see all racist, sexist, homophobic plans he had for the next election😝✨ but as soon as the app finished downloading my phone began reeking👃 of orange peel🍊 but I shrugged it off as a coincidence😌🤷🏻‍♀️. Over the next couple of hours I started to notice every time I touched my phone my skin began turning a bright orange color🙀 and by the end of the day a stem and leaf sprouted out of the top of my head👩🏼‍🦲🌱 if you would not enjoy transitioning into an orange 🍊 this is not the app for you🙅🏻‍♀️ and I absolutely do not appreciate trump forcing his orange-ness onto others😾🤬

attributes.title: Awful app
attributes.review: i was trying to play minecraft on my dads phone when i opened this thing. this orange man wouldnt stop chasing me around my world. he keeps asking for me to vote for him. what even is a president? anyways can someone pls tell this trump man to shut up and stop trying to kill me in MY minecraft world.

attributes.title: mini trumps everywhere🍊
attributes.review: I got this app to see what the amazing hype was to find it asking me for personal INFORMATION?! I thought to myself 💭 what a ✨wonderful✨ wo- ACTUALLY NO❌. I thought to myself hey what about the people who don’t have this app. Don’t their information matter? DONT ALL INFORMATION MATTER?! Anyway i put my phone number in and then they asked me to take my moms magic card with all the numbers on it so I thought WHY NOT! So I did it. Then my mom starting getting money taken out of her money account thing whatever that is so I deleted this app. I thought it wasn’t my fault until LITTLE TINY TRUMP HEADS FILLED MY SCREEN🍊🍊🍊!!! They were EVERYWHERE!!! I soon smashed my phone and threw it away to find trumps EVERWHERE!!! Even in my FRIDGE!!! I didn’t know what to do. I soon got a new phone and the guy giving it to me stared at me WITH MINY TRUMPS IN HIS EYES!!! This was a sign. I quickly downloaded the app. It all stopped. Please don’t get this app. I’m scared for my life! I DONT WANT MINI TRUMPS POSSESSING ME AND YOU DONT EITHER TRUST ME!!!❌🍊

attributes.title: Don’t get
attributes.review: Keeps glitching after taking forever to download

attributes.title: Sorry trump ✋🏽🚫
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to see if maybe I was wrong about our president. did not disappoint, it proved that I was right, he’s the worse.

attributes.title: Disgusting
attributes.review: As soon as I opened the app, a shiny, wrinkled orange asked for my personal information.  I am disappointed as I expected the president of the United States to be, at the very least, a man who understands fractions. After three years of his presidency, I could not tolerate one minute of his app. Disgusted that this app even dares to call itself an app, as it is more of a way to spread the horrible disease of stupidity across the nation.

attributes.title: 0 stars
attributes.review: To actually sit their and actually support this man after his past and sexual assault accusations baffles me.

attributes.title: annoying
attributes.review: i got this app to learn more about trump and his campaign since i just registered to vote. you have to put in your phone number to get further in the app but ever since i did i get messages non-stop and can’t seem to stop it. i turned off all notifications and even responded to the messages with STOP but i kept getting them. not only this, as i began to learn more about his campaign i really started to understand the hate people have for him. this app is promoting hatred and would NEVER recommend anyone to get it. PLEASE DELETE!!!!

attributes.title: yikessss
attributes.review: so i downloaded the app cuz i was curious about what our troubled president was up too. but once i downloaded it, it completely crashed and brought me back to my home screen. i tried again and it did it again and it wouldn't let me type my info in or click anything. so i deleted the app then redownloaded it but this time the title was changed. from "welcome to the trump 2020 campaign app" to "welcome to the sexiest, racist, homophobic hot cheeto's lame excuse of a campaign app!" CRAZYYYY I KNOW. then a naked monkey flew by the screen screaming awful things that i don't wanna repeat. WEIRD. so do not download this app i swear it will give u nightmares and wastes ur storage.
